description.narrative: The objective of the investment is to allow the company to continue its expansion of its Pay-As-You-Go Business in SSA. The proceeds of the funds will primarily be used to fund the acquisition of inventory and the general scale-up of the business. The facility increase of USD5mln (split 50/50 between AEF and Building Prospects) will come on top of the existing USD10.75mln (in LCY) facility with the company.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands

description.narrative: An activity that contains sub-activities (sub-components) which are reported separately to IATI
